comment: Lopez (NYK) sets the screen on Turner (BOS) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
LHH shows that Smart (BOS) maintains legal guarding position and makes incidental contact with Grant (NYK) that does not affect his RSBQ or shot attempt.
[Observable in enhanced video] Grant (NYK) moves his pivot foot after ending his dribble and prior to requesting a timeout.
RHH shows that Johnson (BOS) makes leg to leg contact with Grant (NYK) that affects his RSBQ and causes him to fall.
RATR shows that Lopez (NYK) maintains a legal guarding position as he defends Thomas' (BOS) driving layup attempt. Any contact on the play is initiated by Thomas.
Sullinger (BOS) commits a take foul on Grant (NYK).
RATR shows that Lopez (NYK) and Smart (BOS) make incidental contact with one another during rebounding.
Thomas (NYK) makes contact with Thomas' (BOS) body that affects his movement to the basket and shot attempt.
